ast.name: digit clock
ast.comment:
That's just about the limit.

V 1.53 -Bug fix

V 1.52 -bug fix (weather fix)
- now it is possible to disable the weather for start up speed increase (if you don't disable it will search for weather at start and at XX:00 and at XX:30)

V 1.51 -bug fix

V 1.5 -added appointments
-added weather (if you change am/pm to 24h mode it changes from F to C)
-solved date problem

V 1.42 -solved problem when between 10 pm-12 pm

V 1.41 -solved am/pm problem

V 1.4 -added am/pm mode -also now you can preselect the colour, so you don't have to choose the colour every start
-"change here" method(settings)

V 1.3 -some bugfixes and added UTC
-livetile colour

body.text: Weather service has access regulations! If you use it to much the weather will show nothing :(
So if you don't need weather you can turn it off for speed increase
